rules_text: Target Vehicle creature you control deals damage equal to its power to any target. If a creature or planeswalker dealt damage this way would die this turn, exile it instead.
flavor_text:
[i]“Legend tells of a vessel that's half-kraken, half-ship. Well, let's hope it stays a legend.”
—First mate Mable of the [/i]Sea's Whimsy[i][/i]
